projects.name: aes-encryption-decryption
projects.description: Python program that allows you to encrypt and decrypt files using the AES algorithm. It uses the user's password to derive an AES key via PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA256.

projects.name: incremental-backup-tool
projects.description: This incremental backup application, developed in Python, allows you to copy source files/folders to a destination. This automates the backup process and keeps a history in a Markdown file.

projects.name: game-of-life
projects.description: This code  is a C++ implementation of John Conway's Game of Life. The project, based on the principles of object-oriented programming (OOP), simulates the evolution of a population of cells on a grid.

projects.name: commercial-appointment-manager
projects.description: This website, built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, is an appointment management tool designed for independent professionals. Although the project uses a hair salon as an example, its architecture and main features can easily be adapted to other professions.

projects.name: portfolio
projects.description: This website is a personal profile. It presents my projects, skills and experience in the field of IT. It uses a database in JSON format.

projects.name: worldwide-weather-watcher
projects.description: This school project is a weather monitoring solution for the International Agency for Weather Monitoring. It is an Arduino-based embedded system designed to be installed on ships.

projects.name: sudoku-solver
projects.description: This project is a Sudoku solver implemented in Python. It uses a logical analysis-based approach to fill in a grid while adhering to the classic rules of the game.
